reviewText:
Queen of the Elephants, Directed by the "King of Sex and Horror" films Joe D'Amato.

Queen of the Elephants: Enter a mysterious land of pleasure!
This is a story of a beautiful woman who fears no animal or man; a woman with a yearning to be sexually fulfilled!
Her mastery of animals leads her to a realization that there are human pleasures she has not yet experienced! She's thrown into a passionate world where she finally experiences her sexuality from the pink pleasures of a lesbian encounter to the throbbing thrill of a man giving her the forbidden heat of anal sex!

Queen of the Elephants 2 - Sahara : From the hidden dangers of African jungles to sensuous dunes of the Sahara, the Queen of the Elephants continues her quest for passion. Sensual and exciting, sweet yet aggressive, charming Italian porn star Selen leads you on an adventure of wanting with a taste for human passion! Her want for pleasure increases as her experiences with females and males grows within her.
World renown Joe D'Amato will take you on a trip throughout the mysterious continent of Africa, with authentic animals, true natives and awesome scenery!
